des: "Here is a very different and simple way of enjoying avocados. Use low-sodium soy sauce if desired, but full-flavored is best."
ins: Stir together garlic, ginger, and soy sauce; set aside for five minutes to allow the flavors to blend.  Cut the avocado in half, and discard the pit; divide the sauce between the avocado halves.  Eat with a spoon!
